column2: (let ((d (make-temp-file "neovm-fncip-eval-" t))) (let ((f (expand-file-name "alpha.txt" d))) (with-temp-buffer (insert "x") (write-region nil nil f)) (prog1 (let ((default-directory (file-name-as-directory d))) (file-name-case-insensitive-p "alpha.txt")) (delete-file f) (delete-directory d))))
